en.title: Do you find it intolerable to live with your {{ case.divorceWho }}?
en.mustBeIntolerable: You must find it intolerable to live with your {{ case.divorceWho }} to use adultery as your reason for divorce. This applies whether you're still living together or not.

errors.required: Select yes if you find it intolerable to live with your {{ case.divorceWho }}

cy.title: [CY] Do you find it intolerable to live with your {{ case.divorceWho }}?
cy.mustBeIntolerable: [CY] You must find it intolerable to live with your {{ case.divorceWho }} to use adultery as your reason for divorce. This applies whether you're still living together or not.

errors.required: [CY] Select yes if you find it intolerable to live with your {{ case.divorceWho }}
